runiv 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

CRAN-like Repository Structure

Source: R/runiv_cran_like.R
runiv_cran_like.Rd

CRAN-like repository structure for packages in an R-universe.

runiv_src(universe)

runiv_bin(universe)

Arguments

universe

A length one character. User or organization name of the the R-universe owner.

Value

a data.frame.

Author

Valerio Gherardi

Examples

runiv_src("vgherard")
